channel.title: Dave Winer
channel.description: My new outliner is https://t.co/xgHmOV4Wuf -- it excels in blogging and scripting. All files are OPML and therefore ready to be used in other apps. Bing bong! ðŸ˜€

item.description: I just added "The Great" as one of my favorites on my BingeWorthy profile. It's a funny pseudo-history dramedy in the spirit of Succession or The Death of Stalin. It's about a Russian empress who overthrows her husband the emperor.

source:outline.text: I just added "The Great" as one of my favorites on my BingeWorthy profile. It's a funny pseudo-history dramedy in the spirit of Succession or The Death of Stalin. It's about a Russian empress who overthrows her husband the emperor.
